activationComplete.content: Activation complete! Your phone is good to go. It's now time to turn it on. If it's already on, please restart it.

zero.headline: Ready. Set. Activate.
zero.bodyDesktop: Get your new phone up and running in just a few steps. Activation may take up to two hours while we get your number from your previous carrier. Don't worry, your old phone will work just fine during this time.
zero.explainer: Activation may take up to two hours, but your old phone will work just fine during this time.

two.subhead: Make sure your new phone is off.
two.subContent: We know you're excited, but please make sure your new phone is off in order to get everything working.

three.bodyDesktopPort: Click "Start Activation" and keep both your phones close. At some point within two hours, your service will quickly switch from your old phone to your new phone. We'll send you an email when the switch is complete.
three.bodyMobilePort: Within two hours, service will switch from your old phone to your new phone. We'll send an email when it's done.
three.bodyDesktopNew: Click "Start Activation" and keep your phone close. At some point within two hours, your service will start on your new phone. We'll send you an email when the process is complete.
three.bodyMobileNew: Within two hours, service will start on your new phone. We'll send an email when it's done.

inProgress.subhead: We've got it from here. Activating now.

complete.content: Your new phone is good to go! It's now time to turn it on. If it's already on, please restart it.
complete.messageBody:

explainer.top: Activation can happen any time within a two-hour period.

support.headline: Questions about activation?
support.content: If you get stuck at any point, we're here to help. Chat live with an Expert or call us at (215) 845-5845.

simple.content: Keep an eye on your phone delivery and activation progress.
